00013 #ifndef __AUDACITY_EFFECT_CHANGESPEED__
00014 #define __AUDACITY_EFFECT_CHANGESPEED__
00015 
00016 #include "Effect.h"
00017 #include "../Resample.h"
00018 
00019 #include <wx/choice.h>
00020 #include <wx/dialog.h>
00021 #include <wx/intl.h>
00022 #include <wx/slider.h>
00023 #include <wx/string.h>
00024 #include <wx/textctrl.h>
00025 
00026 class EffectChangeSpeed : public Effect {
00027 
00028  public:
00029    EffectChangeSpeed();
00030 
00031    virtual wxString GetEffectName() {
00032       return wxString(_("Change Speed..."));
00033    }
00034 
00035    virtual std::set<wxString> GetEffectCategories() {
00036       std::set<wxString> result;
00037       result.insert(wxT("http://audacityteam.org/namespace#PitchAndTempo"));
00038       return result;
00039    }
00040 
00041    virtual wxString GetEffectIdentifier() {
00042       return wxString(wxT("ChangeSpeed"));
00043    }
00044 
00045    virtual wxString GetEffectAction() {
00046       return wxString(_("Changing Speed"));
00047    }
00048    
00049    // Useful only after PromptUser values have been set. 
00050    virtual wxString GetEffectDescription(); 
00051 
00052  protected:
00053    virtual bool PromptUser();
00054    virtual bool TransferParameters( Shuttle & shuttle );
00055    virtual bool Process();
00056 
00057  private:
00058    bool ProcessOne(WaveTrack * t,
00059                    sampleCount start, sampleCount end);
00060 
00061  private:
00062    // track related
00063    int    mCurTrackNum;
00064    double m_maxNewLength;
00065    double mCurT0;
00066    double mCurT1;
00067 
00068    // control values
00069    double   m_PercentChange;  // percent change to apply to tempo
00070                               // -100% is meaningless, but sky's the upper limit.
00071                               // Slider is (-100, 200], but textCtrls can set higher.
00072    int      m_FromVinyl;      // from standard vinyl speed (RPM)
00073    int      m_ToVinyl;        // to standard vinyl speed (RPM)
00074 
00075    
00076 friend class ChangeSpeedDialog;
00077 };
00078

00097    void OnChoice_ToVinyl(wxCommandEvent & event); 
00098 
00099    void OnPreview(wxCommandEvent &event);
00100 
00101    // helper fns
00102    void Update_Text_PercentChange(); // Update control per current m_PercentChange.
00103    void Update_Slider_PercentChange(); // Update control per current m_PercentChange.
00104    void Update_Vinyl(); // Update Vinyl controls for new percent change.
00105    void Update_PercentChange(); // Update percent change controls for new Vinyl values.
00106

00108    EffectChangeSpeed * mEffect;

00115    wxChoice *     m_pChoice_ToVinyl;
00116 
00117  public:
00118    // effect parameters
00119    double   m_PercentChange;  // percent change to apply to tempo
00120                               // -100% is meaningless, but sky's the upper limit.
00121                               // Slider is (-100, 200], but textCtrls can set higher.
00122    int      m_FromVinyl;      // from standard vinyl speed (RPM)
00123    int      m_ToVinyl;        // to standard vinyl speed (RPM)
